title: Art and Picture Book Activity: Mended Petal
copy: Play with texture, smooth lines, and cracked surfaces using Yoko Ono’s Mended Petal . Enjoy the read aloud link for “Inch by Inch” by Leo Lionni and discover how the inchworm can measure this tall sculpture and other objects. Designed especially for young learners, this resource offers creative ideas for looking at and responding to art together.   Illinois Early Learning Standards: Learning Standard 2.D Establish personal connection with books. Learning Standard 7.C Explore tools used for measurement.
